bioghist.p: Jack Akerboom is a genealogist who has published several works, including The Descendants of Hans Lauer/Lower.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of family histories, church and cemetery records, marriage records, and county genealogical records. Family histories are largely compiled by other genealogists, some of them being previously published works and some of them unpublished research. One exception is the Cotterman family history, which was compiled by Harold Van Horn and Jack Akerboom. The church and cemetery records consist of photocopies of various indexes and lists which Akerboom has pulled together and arranged. Three of the cemetery records were published by the Tulpehocken Settlement Historical Society. The two-volume Genealogical and Biographical Annals of Northumberland County was downloaded from rootsweb.org.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
